channel.title: Can you make yourself invincable
channel.description: How do you make your self invincable??

item.title: Can you make yourself invincable
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

to make ur self invisible add these commands in ur client.java:

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("urnamegoeshere")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

and to make urself visible again add this command below that one^^^:

if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("urnamegoeshere")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Can you make yourself invincable
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

Yes you can make yourself both invincible AND invisible
Invincible: Simply edit your stats at your char. file (99999 stats etc)

Invisible: Make a command that makes you a npc that doesnt exist therefore invisible
and then a code that makes you normal againâ€¦
(or just use a pnpc code and then log out n in)

Read full topic
